title: New: Tei Shi – No Angel (Beyoncé Cover)
body:
Let’s face it, it’s near impossible to cover Beyoncé, yet Brooklyn songstress **Tei Shi** manages to knock this version of _No Angel_ out of the park.

Adding her own unique touch to the Caroline Polachek co-written track, and featuring her own, tender yet versatile vocals, it’s a taster ahead of new original material expected later this year. Check out No Angel below.

Adding her own unique touch to the Caroline Polachek co-written track, and featuring her own, tender yet versatile vocals, it’s a taster ahead of new original material expected later \[…\]
